attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Electro Wheel
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, switch it with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
